doc.title: Check Date: An Underdog Love Story
doc.plot: Check Date, an underdog love story is a stop-motion animated short film about loyalty and love. The story is set in a chess game, where fateful lovers must struggle with cultural and social barriers to be together. The action starts when a black pawn breaks the "rules", falling in love with the besieged white queen, which is being attacked by the black king words such as 'loyalty", "heritage", and "betrayal" give him an unexpected pause of caution He is, of course, a similarly colored soldier of the same chess-nation as the King. He is confused, but he becomes aware of a steady thumping coming from his heart, and he decides to attack the king and knocks him down. The queen, now relieved, approaches the pawn and gives him a very sweet kiss. The black pawn is now happy. "He doesn't need to be a king to conquer the queen and doesn't need to be white to win her over..."
